titles.title: To suspend until December 31, 2002, the duty on triacetonamine.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/26/1999--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2002, the duty on 4-piperdone 2,2,6, 6 tetramethyl (triacetonamine).
